revised_title: Corrigenda in Mr. W. Shanks's Tables: On the Number of Figures in the Reciprocal of a Prime
tldr: Lieut.-Colonel Allan Cunningham examines Mr. W. Shanks's tables of reciprocals of prime numbers and discovers discrepancies between Shanks's manuscript and printed German tables. He identifies and corrects errors in the tables, providing a more accurate representation of the number of figures in the reciprocal of a prime.
